landing.service.1.title: üîç Intelligent matching
landing.service.1.text: Our platform automatically connects cargo and transport by route, date, vehicle type, search radius and current geolocation. You get relevant offers ‚Äî even without filtering.
landing.service.2.title: ‚ö° Real-time operation
landing.service.2.text: All updates happen instantly: new requests, route changes, delivery status and chat messages. The platform syncs data without delay.
landing.service.3.title: üó∫ Smart map & geo-analytics
landing.service.3.text: Clusters and smart hints on the map: grouping by region, highlighting optimal routes, filtering by radius and key points ‚Äî for faster decisions.
landing.service.4.title: üîî Automatic notifications
landing.service.4.text: No more wasting time searching! As soon as cargo or transport matching your criteria appears, the system notifies you immediately.
landing.service.5.title: üõ° Security & control
landing.service.5.text: User verification, tracking deal stages, protection of files and messages ‚Äî a reliable tool for business.
landing.service.6.title: üë• Multi-role accounts
landing.service.6.text: Manage roles within one account: cargo owner, carrier or forwarder. Convenient for companies with many employees.
landing.service.7.title: üåç Flexibility & scalability
landing.service.7.text: TransInfo is equally effective for local and international logistics. The more requests and vehicles there are, the better intelligent matching works.
hero.title: Intelligent platform for shipments
hero.subtitle: Smart matching by route, date and geolocation. Fast, convenient and simple.

terms.title: User agreement
terms.s1.p1: 1.1. This document sets the rules and terms for using Transinfo (hereinafter, the ‚ÄúPlatform‚Äù).
terms.s1.p2: 1.2. The owner and administrator of the Platform is LLC ‚ÄúTransinfo‚Äù, Georgia, Tbilisi, Chabukiani St. No. 2.
terms.s1.p3: 1.3. The Platform‚Äôs purpose is to connect cargo owners and carriers through information exchange.
terms.s1.p4: 1.4. By registering on or using the Platform, the user confirms that they have read and agree to these terms and conditions.
terms.s2.p1: 2.1. To access the full range of services, user registration is required.
terms.s2.p2: 2.2. When registering, the user must provide complete, accurate, and reliable information.
terms.s2.p3: 2.3. Creating accounts with false, duplicate, or third-party data is prohibited.
terms.s2.p4: 2.4. The user is responsible for the security of their account and password.
terms.s3.p1: 3.1. The Platform provides only the means to establish contact between parties and exchange information.
terms.s3.p2: 3.2. The Platform does not directly or indirectly participate in contracts concluded between users.
terms.s3.p3: 3.3. Financial and legal arrangements are concluded directly between the parties without the Platform‚Äôs involvement.
terms.s4.p1: 4.1. The user must use the Platform only for purposes compliant with applicable law and these terms.
terms.s4.p2: 4.2. Posting false or misleading information is prohibited.
terms.s4.p3: 4.3. Using the Platform for illegal activities is prohibited, including fraud, money laundering, distribution of prohibited cargo, and other violations.
terms.s4.p4: 4.4. Users must maintain mutual respect and communication ethics.
terms.s5.p1: 5.1. The Platform is not responsible for agreements between users, loss or damage of cargo, or missed deadlines.
terms.s5.p2: 5.2. The Platform‚Äôs responsibility is limited to the technical correctness of the service and website availability.
terms.s5.p3: 5.3. In case of violations, the administration may block or delete an account.
terms.s6.p1: 6.1. The Platform processes and protects personal data in accordance with applicable law.
terms.s6.p2: 6.2. Personal data is used only to provide the service and is not transferred to third parties except as required by law.
terms.s7.p1: 7.1. All disputes related to use of the Platform shall first be resolved through negotiations.
terms.s7.p2: 7.2. Failing agreement, disputes shall be resolved under Georgian law by a competent court or arbitration.
terms.s8.p1: 8.1. The administration may change these terms and conditions at any time.
terms.s8.p2: 8.2. Changes take effect upon publication on the Platform.

live.share.helpTooltip:
What is a public link?
‚Ä¢ Anyone with the link can view your LIVE track.
‚Ä¢ As soon as someone opens the link, ‚ÄúLIVE‚Äù will light up on your side.
‚Ä¢ You can disable the link at any time ‚Äî it will stop working and viewers will disconnect.
‚Ä¢ The link is currently created for 7 days. If needed, the period can be changed.
